channel.title: Kerberos on Marco Zufferli
channel.description: Recent content in Kerberos on Marco Zufferli

item.title: Demystify Kerberos Delegation
item.description: Explains unconstrained, constrained and resource-based delegation with configuration examples, failure modes and mitigation guidance.

item.title: Not So Brief Overview about Kerberos
item.description: An in-depth walkthrough of Kerberos authentication: TGT/TGS lifecycle, SPNs, PAC and how to inspect Kerberos traffic.
